page.title: 04WHERE PEOPLE LIVE & WORK
page.content: Total population of{58}people Arkleside _ { 8} Employed {28} Gammersgill_ {7} Unemployed { 2} Horsehouse _{34} Retired {15} Swineside _{ 9} Housewives { 2} Children {11 {Employed in Dale}22 in Farming 2 Pub 2 Hotel,Houskeeper,Postmistress,Shopkeep er,Craftshop/Guesthouse. {6 outside the Dale} Teacher, female _local Comprehensive Builder,male _ Leyburn 8 miles. Company Secretary,male _ Masham 16mls Shopkeeper,male _ Richmond 15 miles. Swineside Ceramics, husband/wife private business which started in Swineside now in Leyburn, flourishing selling nationwide Europe America, Australia,Sinagpore & Japan. {Employment for others from outside Farming casual/seasonal only 6 Farmers with land in area but live outside.
